member.name: T:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot
member.summary: This class represents the robot and can be used for controlling the physical robot, or simulating it's movements by using the specified events. This class is designed as Singleton, which means theres only one instance available and you can't create a new one.

member.name: M:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.GetInstance
member.summary: Returns a unique instance of the Edubot object.

member.name: F:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.primaryAxis
member.summary: The primary axis of the robot, which is located on the top of the scaffold.

member.name: F:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.secondaryAxis
member.summary: The secondary axis of the robot, which is located at the end of the first axis.

member.name: F:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.verticalAxis
member.summary: The vertical axis of the robot, which is located at the end of the second axis.

member.name: F:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.toolAxis
member.summary: The tool axis of the robot, which is located above the actual tool,

member.name: M:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the tool to the specified 3D-Point (x,y,z).

member.name: M:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.UseTool(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Activates or deactivates the robot's tool.
member.param: True if the tool should be activated, false if the tool should be deactivated.

member.name: M:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.Start
member.summary: Turns the robot on

member.name: M:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.Shutdown
member.summary: Turns the robot off.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnStartup
member.summary: Triggered after the robot has started.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnConnected
member.summary: Triggered after the connection to the physical robot is established.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnDiconnected
member.summary: Triggered after the connection to the physical robot is lost or closed.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnShutdown
member.summary: Triggered before the robot is shutting down.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnAxisAngleChanged
member.summary: Triggered if the angle of an axis has changed. The specific axis can be found in the event arguments.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnInterpolationChanged
member.summary: Triggered if the interpolation type of the robot has changed.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnToolUsed
member.summary: Triggered if the robot's tool was activated or deactivated.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.OnStateChanged
member.summary: Triggered if the robot's state has changed.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.State
member.summary: Gets the current state of the robot.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.Interpolation
member.summary: Gets or sets the interpolation type, which is used for calculating the path of the robot's movements.

member.name: T:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Edubot.EdubotCreator
member.summary: This class is used for creating the instance of Edubot object. Since the Edubot class is a designed as a Singleton, there is only one instance of the Edubot available.

member.name: T:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.IInterpolationType
member.summary: This interface represents an interpolation type. Any class implementing this interface can be used for path calculation.

member.name: T:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis
member.summary: This class represents an axis of the robot, containing most of the information used for path calculation.

member.name: M:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis.Rotate(System.Int64,System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates the axis for the specified amount of ticks by using the specified speed

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis.X
member.summary: Gets the x-coordinate of the axis

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis.Y
member.summary: Gets the y-coordinate of the axis

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis.Z
member.summary: Gets the z-coordinate of the axis

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the axis

member.name: P:HTL.Grieskirchen.Edubot.API.Axis.Angle
member.summary: Gets the angle of the engine, which is related to this axis
